components.name: Frontend
components.description: A Single Page Application built using React and TypeScript, providing a user interface for the e-commerce platform.

components.name: User Service
components.description: Manages user authentication and user-related operations, ensuring secure access to the platform.

components.name: Product Service
components.description: Handles the product catalog and inventory management, allowing users to browse and search for products.

components.name: Payment Service
components.description: Integrates with external payment processors like Stripe to handle transactions securely.

components.name: User Database
components.description: PostgreSQL database used for storing user-related data, ensuring data integrity and security.

data_flows.description: User authentication requests are sent from the frontend to the User Service.
User data is stored and retrieved from the User Database.
Payment information is sent from the frontend to the Payment Service for processing.
Payment transactions are processed through the Stripe payment gateway.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates user data management from other services to protect sensitive information.

trust_boundaries.name: Payment Processing Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that ensures secure handling of payment information and transactions.
